subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=1|rs=音00}}

# [[sound]]
# [[timbre]]
# {{short for|lang=ja|音楽|tr=ongaku|nodot=1|sort=おん}}: [[music]]
# [[speech]] {{gl|[[phonetics]]}}
# {{short for|lang=ja|字音|tr=jion|nodot=1}}: [[Chinese]]-derived [[reading]] of a ''[[kanji]]''
# [[news]], [[tiding]]s

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|おん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おん}}

# [[sound]]
# {{lb|ja|linguistics|sort=おん}} [[speech]] [[sound]]
# {{short for|lang=ja|音読み|tr=on'yomi|nodot=1|sort=おん}}: the [[Chinese]]-derived [[reading]] of a ''[[kanji]]''
# {{lb|ja|by extension}} reading of a [[Chinese character]] outside the Japanese language; [[rime]]
# {{short for|lang=ja|音楽|tr=ongaku|nodot=1|sort=おん}}: [[music]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|おと|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK2}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: ''Oto'' is used for loud sounds and voices, as opposed to ''ne'' (see below).

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|足音|あしおと}}
* {{ja-r|音に聞く|おと に きく}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|風の音の|かぜ の と の|pos=pillow word}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ね|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ね|-}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ね|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: ''Ne'' is used for relatively soft sounds and voices that appeals to human emotions, as opposed to ''oto'' (see above).

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|いん|y=kanon}}

subSections.title: Affix
